channel.title: Data Science Portfolio on Sohan Puthran
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on Sohan Puthran

item.title: F - String
item.description: Python makes it easier to find how many times a substring / character appears in a larger string. This comes in handy when you are doing text analysis.

item.title: Long Number
item.description: If you have to use a long number in your python script, try separating the number using underscore (as shown) to make it easier to read. The interpreter removes the underscores and reads it as a normal number.

item.title: Ananke: a Hugo Theme
item.description: Welcome to my blog with some of my work in progress. I’ve been working on this book idea. You can read some of the chapters below.
